name: Ramuto Rush
description:
A time-filler game with a lot of fun and fantastic design, with only two buttons you run your way through the world of Naruto and collect delicious ramen and complete missions to get to the next level.

A small school project done by a group of three people during a game module at HSLU in three weeks. The game only has one level for now.

Controls

W - move up

S - move down

The controls are simple, you can only go up or down. To go forward you need to get three ramen bowls, your mission is to get to the last row by avoiding shurikens and by getting there on time.
